Html: Could the VS addin be made into a "custom tool" that outputs the .js files?  This way when you save the .ts file the .js file will be generated.  It would also be useful to set the options.
We're working on improving the VS2012 plugin.  Adding a feature request to the issue tracker will let us track this suggestion (and have a better chance of being seen)
I created my own custom tool. You can try it: https://github.com/vhenzl/TypeScriptGenerator
